00038 
00039 class ManagedSafeArray
00040 {
00041     public:
00042 
00043     ManagedSafeArray(VARIANT& v, long size)
00044     :   size_(size),
00045         array_(0),
00046         data_(0)
00047     {
00048         if (!(v.vt & VT_ARRAY) || !v.parray)
00049             throw RawEgg("ManagedSafeArray(): VARIANT error.");
00050 
00051         HRESULT hr = SafeArrayAccessData(v.parray, &data_);
00052         if (FAILED(hr) || !data_)
00053             throw RawEgg("ManagedSafeArray(): Data access error.");
00054 
00055         array_ = v.parray;
00056         v.parray = NULL;
00057     }
00058 
00059     ~ManagedSafeArray()
00060     {
00061         SafeArrayUnaccessData(array_);
00062         SafeArrayDestroy(array_);
00063     }
00064 
00065     long size() const {return size_;}
00066     void* data() const {return data_;}
00067 
00068     private:
00069     long size_;
00070     SAFEARRAY FAR* array_;
00071     void* data_;
00072 
00073     ManagedSafeArray(ManagedSafeArray&);
00074     ManagedSafeArray& operator=(ManagedSafeArray&);
00075 };
00076 
00077 
00078 class VariantStringArray : public StringArray
00079 {
00080     public:
00081 
00082     VariantStringArray(VARIANT& v, long size)
00083     :   msa_(v, size)
00084     {
00085         if (v.vt != (VT_ARRAY | VT_BSTR))
00086             throw RawEgg("VariantStringArray(): VARIANT error.");
00087     }
00088 
00089     virtual int size() const {return msa_.size();}
00090 
00091     virtual string item(int index) const
00092     {
00093         if (index<0 || index>=msa_.size())
00094             throw RawEgg("VariantStringArray: Array out of bounds.");
00095 
00096         BSTR* p = (BSTR*)msa_.data();
00097         _bstr_t bstr(p[index]);
00098         return (const char*)(bstr);
00099     }
00100 
00101     private:
00102     ManagedSafeArray msa_;
00103 
00104     VariantStringArray(VariantStringArray&);
00105     VariantStringArray& operator=(VariantStringArray&);
00106 };
